page.title: 05Major road
page.content: Twenty yards to the south east,a busy main road bypasses Ogbourne St George village.It leads to Swindon and to Marlborough.The road is a little quieter in the afternoon.I did a traffic count for ten minutes in the morning when 87 cars passed.Most of the drivers were travelling from Marlborough to Swindon.13 lorries passed,most of them from Swindon.In the afternoon I counted 61 cars and 9 lorries but there were also motorbikes and vans and a caravan.I can hear the traffic from my house in the village but it is not very loud. There is a secondary road going under the main road which goes to the next village.It is a quiet road but there is a bus service and some cars use this road.The major road is not used by pedestrians or bicycles.It is a busy road for heavy traffic.
